p: The experiment was performed using the expression Compact Mass Spectrometer and Atmospheric Solids Analysis Probe (ASAP) from Advion, Inc. (Ithaca, NY, USA) to measure the presence of saponin compounds contained in the complex matrix including methanol extracts of detergent plants, callus of selected detergent plant in comparison with the standards following the standard protocol of Perez-Hurtado et al. [ 78]. The instrument was operated in positive ionization mode. All the spectra were acquired within the range of m/z 400â€“430.
